mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
  • Sound Card: No
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11 Big Sur
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX-11 compliant graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
  • Sound Card: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX-11 compliant graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
